name: Rezna
description:
Rezna is a game. Hotseat. Two player only.

Features:

  • Jumping
  • Double Jumping
  • Accidentally shooting your friend
  • Not accidentally shooting your friend
  • Hardcore fight with the ultimate  boss (now with working hitboxes)
  • Over 6 levels including BOSS FIGHT
  • Over 3 music tracks
  • Intuitive UI
  • Over one hour of maybe FUN gameplay
  • Game won't crash most of the time
  • Some gamepad support
  • Keyboard support
  • Fullscreen
  • Game is finished

Special thanks to:

  • Vavilon for voicing the boss
  • Graff for making one animation
